scripts.hakatashi: cd web && pug -O hakatashi.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > hakatashi.html
scripts.hiromu: cd web && pug -O hiromu.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > hiromu.html
scripts.hideo: cd web && pug -O hideo54.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/page.jade > hideo54.html
scripts.index: cd web && pug -O index.js -p beautiful-hexo/layout/index.jade -P < beautiful-hexo/layout/index.jade > index.html
scripts.build: npm run index && npm run hakatashi && npm run hiromu && npm run hideo
